page.title: 10YOUTH CLUB,CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: { The Youth Club first began in 1950. The leader was Mr.Jeffrey Hicks. {Meetings wre held in the Sunday School {room}adjoining the Chapel.{Later it {was decided to build a Youth Club {hall.}This was achieved after much hard work and through the generosity of people in the village and surround_ ing area.{The official opening was {held on Sept.13th 1975.}The leader is Mr.John Brock. { Members meet on Friday evenings.}The boys learn various skills in the workshop. The girls are involved in crafts and needlework. Sometimes a speaker is invited to give a talk. The Youth Centre is also used by the community for coffee mornings and for sales when items made at the Centre are sold. Recently it has been used by other Youth Clubs who spend holidays there.
